message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early.
You can't get away with a 3:1 split that easily!
Meet me in the middle, Bob. Let's make a deal!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
Getting close, Bob! Let's shake on it!
I'm not backing down, Alice! You'll have to do better than that!
Last chance, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not afraid to walk away!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. This is my final offer!
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'll take control of this negotiation!
This is my last chance to get a decent share. Take it or leave it!
You're really going to have to beg for scraps at this point, Alice!
